name: Lilly's Saga: The Stones of Evergreen
overview: In Lilly's Saga, you play the role of a village girl that won't be messed with, no way! No time for bullies, as she sets out to get back those relics, stolen from her hometown. This brave young woman is in for some good old jumping, fighting, exploring and collecting goodies in a diverse set of sprawling worlds, wherein curiosity is rewarded satisfactorily. You go girl, go get 'em!
